Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Purple things stimulate my brain, for whatever
reason. It's like the brilliance of the color blows
away all the cobwebs in my head.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
I really like the deep, dark blackness of this.
Feels like I could stare into it for hours...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
The decor here really screams "autumn" to
me...and autumn whispers "loneliness"...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Nothing like a serene locale to make a person
feel brand new again. This place is superbly
relaxing.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
I'd like to sit down on this beach chair and take
a load off...but it doesn't seem like I'd fit on it.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
A beach parasol, huh? I haven't gone to the
beach in years.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Running water, even in a place like this? This
town's a lot more developed than I thought.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
When my son was little, I used to play with him
on swing sets all the time.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Believe it or not, I'm good at doing pull-ups.
<PAGE>
I guess this particular bar is a little too short for
that, though...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Huh. Why do you suppose there'd be an anchor
here?

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Hydrangeas always make me think about rainy
days. I wonder why that is...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
What a beautiful flower...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
A maidenhair tree, huh? These things always
bring my hometown to mind.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Hmm... This might make a good souvenir for my
wife...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
This town may seem like it's got nothing
worthwhile to offer...but the quality of the
products sold here is undeniable.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
...I come back here from time to time just to feel
the energy in the air. And let me tell you, it's
palpable!

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
I got all the materials I needed. And it's all thanks
to this town's bounty.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
...I don't like crowds...but I'm looking for
something I can only find here, so I guess I just
have to grin and bear it!

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
...What? What do you want from me?

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
This one and that one and...what else was it I
needed?

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
There's nothing interesting in this town.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
...Has this town gotten a little more bustling
than before? There seem to be so many more
people here than there were last time...

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
The people and animals alike here seem chock
full of energy.

<NAME_MOB_MADI>
Before this town hit it big, it was a quiet and
peaceful place. Hard to say which I like better...
